com.mapbox.services.staticimage.v1

Class MapboxStaticImage.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.staticimage.v1.MapboxStaticImage.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    MapboxStaticImage

    public static class MapboxStaticImage.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Static image builder used to customize the image, including location, image width/height, and camera position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapboxStaticImage.Builder()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapboxStaticImage.Builder

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • setAccessToken

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
        Required to call when building MapboxStaticImage.Builder.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Mapbox access token, you must have a Mapbox account in order to use this library.

      • setUsername

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Set the map style username. Typically will either be your Mapbox username or if you are using one of the defaults Mapbox styles, the username will be "mapbox".
        Parameters:
        username - You will need to pass in your Mapbox username.

      • setStyleId

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setStyleId(java.lang.String styleId)
        You'll need to set what map style you'd like the static image to display.
        Parameters:
        styleId - can be one of the defaults or your own.

      • setLon

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setLon(double lon)
        Longitude for the center point of the static map.
        Parameters:
        lon - double number between -180 and 180.

      • setLat

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setLat(double lat)
        Latitude for the center point of the static map.
        Parameters:
        lat - double number between -90 and 90.

      • setZoom

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setZoom(double zoom)
        static map zoom level. Fractional zoom levels will be rounded to two decimal places.
        Parameters:
        zoom - double number between 0 and 22.

      • setBearing

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setBearing(double bearing)
        Optionally, bearing rotates the map around its center. A value of 90 rotates the map 90° to the left. 180 flips the map. Defaults is 0.
        Parameters:
        bearing - double number between 0 and 360, interpreted as decimal degrees.

      • setPitch

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setPitch(double pitch)
        Optionally, pitch tilts the map, producing a perspective effect. Defaults is 0.
        Parameters:
        pitch - double number between 0 and 60.

      • setWidth

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setWidth(int width)
        width of the image.
        Parameters:
        width - double number between 1 and 1280.

      • setHeight

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setHeight(int height)
        height of the image.
        Parameters:
        height - double number between 1 and 1280.

      • setRetina

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setRetina(boolean retina)
        Optionally, use to request a retina 2x image that will be returned.
        Parameters:
        retina - true if you'd like a retina image.

      • setAttribution

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setAttribution(boolean attribution)
        Optionally, control whether there is attribution on the image. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        attribution - true places attribution on image.

      • setLogo

        public MapboxStaticImage.Builder setLogo(boolean logo)
        Optionally, control whether there is a Mapbox logo on the image. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        logo - true places Mapbox logo on image.

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Get the username you set within the builder. Typically your own Mapbox username or if you used a defaults Mapbox style, it will be "mapbox".
        Returns:
        String with the username.

      • getStyleId

        public java.lang.String getStyleId()
        Get what map style your static image will display.
        Returns:
        String containing static map id.

      • getLocationPathSegment

        public java.lang.String getLocationPathSegment()
        Gives location information about the static image including longitude, latitude, zoom, bearing, and pitch.
        Returns:
        String value with static image location information.

      • getSizePathSegment

        public java.lang.String getSizePathSegment()
        Gives the height and width of the static image.
        Returns:
        String giving width, height and retina.

      • isAttribution

        public boolean isAttribution()
        Determine if the static image will contain attribution.
        Returns:
        true if attribution will be on static image.

      • isLogo

        public boolean isLogo()
        Determine if the static image will contain Mapbox logo.
        Returns:
        true if Mapbox logo will be on static image.

      • build

        public MapboxStaticImage build()
        Build the client when all user parameters have been set.
